project.projectDescription: In our daily life, take the airplane is becoming more and more popular. During our trip by airplane, we sometimes meet the delay of airplane. Then we need to wait. It is very unpleasant. By statistic analyze, Can we conclude the relationship between delay and the airplane server time per week or the relationship between delay and the name of airplane. If we can ,then ,maybe next time you can choose airplane by this conclusion.
project.dataDescription:
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datasets/openml-datasets/master/data/airlines/airlines.csv
Only choose Airline, Time, Delay column and reduce them to 500 rows.
project.researchQuestion: Does airplane server time per week has a positive relationship with its delay? Does airplane’s company has a relationship with its delay?
project.conclusion:
By the cor value:-0.11 the server time and Delay has no significant relationship.
By the summary, we can clear see that the Airline name: ”AS” server the most little time. The “F9” and “WN”’s server time is a const number. Never change. The AS, YV delay every time and F9 never delay. The F value is not big enough to support that Time is diff between different Airline.
